dtliExcerpt: The musical 'High,' which opened on Tuesday night at the Booth Theater, is a well-intentioned but ultimately earthbound effort to dramatize the struggles of addiction and recovery.
bwwExcerpt: 'High,' directed by Rob Ruggiero, isn't a particularly subtle or deep drama, despite some fancy narration... But it does afford Ms. Turner's fans a choice opportunity to bask in her undeniable star wattage. Her performance as the tough but troubled Sister Jamie is funny, consistently entertaining and at times satisfyingly hammy.
